remarks: The cardinality of an infinite set does not change after subtracting a strictly smaller one.  Example in [Enderton] p. 164.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
statement: infdif $p |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ A /\ B ~< A ) -> ( A \ B ) ~~ A ) $.
